title: april 16: misinfluenced [hosted by: Tessa Violet]
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Tessa Violet talks about the time that Time Magazine named Elizabeth Holmes one of the most influential people in the world....only to have her company be exposed as a fraud. Then, she looks back on the groundbreaking moment that Kendrick Lamar won a Pulitzer Prize. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
